data.title: Great Time- Even if you're not a believer.
data.text: Our family is a group of ghost believers and non-believers and we all had an amazing time. The tour was fully of history and awesome stories! There is something for everyone. I would recommend this tour to anyone traveling through New Braunfels! Make sure that you are physically fit enough to walk and stand for roughly 90 minutes though is my suggestion. I mean we're not athletes or anywhere close, and we enjoyed but just make sure that you can handle it. Like I said, we had a great time, and the lady that did our tour was super enthusiastic which made it way more fun. (kindergarten teacher by day) My boyfriend and I hope to go back and do the pub crawl!

data.title: great fun!
data.text: This tour really delivers! Had a blast learning about the history of NB. Enjoyed the stories of haunted sites and of ghosts.

data.title: Spooky Tour of the Heart of New Braunfels
data.text: The tour took us around downtown New Braunfels. We stopped at several places, all with historical significance and their own spooky tale. Not only did we get good ghost stories, but we also learned about the individual histories of each stop. Our guide was very knowledgeable and energetic. You can also drink while on the tour! This is an excellent tour of downtown, so if you are looking to know where the hot spots are, come take this tour. You will leave informed AND entertained!

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for joining us! It was perfect night for a tour and the weather was so accommodating.  We love our little town and it's haunted history. Glad we were able to share it with you. Come back!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: New Braunfels + Ghosts + Pubs = Great combination.
data.text: Fun and enthusiastic tour guides bring New Braunfels to life (after death)!!!  A must do!!!  Very well organized among all the Pubs and plenty of time to spend in each one... just leave a little bit in your glass or bottle for the spirits.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We love our repeat customers! Thanks for supporting small businesses.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stories and very fun evening!!
data.text: We had such a good time on the Ghost Tour! So many interesting and spooky stories about locations we visit all the time. Every time I go by these favorite "haunts", I will think of the tales and remember the stories. I loved that it was all around downtown and the knowledgeable guides even had some pictures on her iPad to show and make it all more believable! Great evening for my daughter and 2 grandsons! I look forward to the next one. Thank you, Ghost Tours.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We were so happy we got the chance to share our town's wonderful history with you and your family.  Come back again for a pub crawl!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun, Entertaining, and Educational
data.text: If you like history, ghosts, and good stories you will enjoy New Braunfels Ghost Tours. Our guide was very animated and knowledgeable. Bring some extra cash for the stop at Two Tarts bakery for a little break.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for your kind words and especially for supporting small businesses.  We appreciate your review and were so glad you stopped by.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great history & storytelling
data.text: Got a lot more out of this than I expected!  Learned some interesting history about the little town, and "fatal details" (hence, the ghost tour...) about a few of New Braunfel's prominent families through the years.  Our guide had authentic photographs on her iPad that she showed along with her narrative, which made the subjects of her stories more real. Make sure you wear comfy shoes; the walking tour lasted about 90 minutes.

data.title: July 25 2015
data.text: If you want something to do while you are in New Braunfels, the New Braunfels Ghost Tour is it. It is very informative about the history of this town. Not at all scary when telling about the ghosts that inhabit the buildings. A great attraction.

data.title: story telling
data.text: This company works w/ groups in the evening, 8p start. You walk a bit around the old part of NB and stop at @ 6 places for stories of allegedly true happenings. Ladies running it were nice and knowledgeable. You learn about the area, the germans who settled and more. No stops go inside buildings where sightings occur so it lacks that dimension. You are never really creeped out at all - just hear stories. No cemetery visit or anything. Needs a dimension of fear or apprehension to get better review.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for joining us. Like most ghost tours, we give tours at night when buildings are closed and inaccessible. A cemetery tour would also be fun and we have done those in the day time but our city closes them at  dusk. We agree a night time tour would be amazing! The murders, suicides and deaths we talk about are all documented and true. It s up to the guests to believe in the ghost stories. I encourage you to take a local ghost tour. Houston has some great ones! I hope you enjoyed your NB visit. Come back soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Ghost Tour Aficionado Approved
data.text: I've been a ghost tour connoisseur since my first tour in Gettysburg, PA (which was fantastic). I like to do tours in cities I visit to get a fun and spooky twist on the local history, but I hate it when the supernatural doesn't actually match up with the area's real history. I was excited to see a ghost tour set up in the perfect venue where I currently hang my hat, so I checked it out as soon as I could. I was not disappointed. NB Ghost Tours has nailed the authenticity, eeriness, and fun of the ideal ghost tour. This is an absolute must-do, whether you're visiting New Braunfels or have lived here for years!

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for checking us out. Your review was most generous and we appreciate it.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Private Birthday Party Pub/Ghost  Tour
data.text: We had a blast at our birthday pub/ghost tour. The ladies did a great job telling us the ghost stories for each location and some NB history while being pretty funny! Most bars gave us a little discount for being in the tour.  That night it poured rain but we kept trucking on! Recommend for sure anyone in New Braunfels

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Glad you all had a blast! What a fun night and a great group of folks makes a big difference. It didn't rain on your parade either.  Hope to see you on a regular tour soon. Thanks for booking us privately.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: So much fun...
data.text: Excellent tour! These folks have really done their homework (obviously since it was started by teachers). Creepy enough to keep you entertained, but without resorting to hokey one-liners. Even if you don't believe in the supernatural, it's a great insight to the history of one of Texas' oldest towns.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for taking time to review our tour and your words were very generous. We have worked hard at gathering facts, keeping folks entertained and being informative all in one. So glad you joined us this summer.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great way to spend an evening in New Braunfels
data.text: My husband and I did the Haunted Pub Crawl last week and had a blast. 5 haunted bars in 3 hours! Anita and Kathryn gave us each bar's history and haunts.  We used ghost apps on our phone which was fun and at the end we all used our smart phones to do an online quiz they made. The quiz  tested our knowledge of the history of NB and stories told. The winner got a NB Ghost Tour shirt. This experience was like none I have ever had. The guides are full of information and very funny too! We'll be back to take a regular tour.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Glad you could take a Haunted Pub Crawl with us. They have been very popular indeed! We have tried to keep up with technology and adding smart phones with ghost apps and online quiz have made things lots of fun. Can't wait to see you on a regular tour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Much fun & interesting.  Great guides
data.text:
Highly recommended for anyone interested in New Braunfels history or ghost stories.The tour is educational yet spooky fun for us believers. The guides were friendly, fun and most important, knowledgeable - someone has done some serious homework. They chose interesting tales, some scary, funny, sad, old and even young ghost activity. They show associated pictures on their electronic devices during the tour to help visualize some of the stories. The walk was easy because there are plenty of stops where sitting is available while the story is told. I appreciate the historical lessons because I'm new to NB so it makes my time downtown even more enjoyable... now I know what buildings Emma haunts or sometimes I look for Mr Von Coll while having coffee. I will certainly do the tour again when family and friends visit. 
Good Job Ghost Tours! Keep up the exciting energy.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind review. We have worked really hard, doing our homework to get all our facts in order and at the same time offer some haunted stories along the way. Thanks for choosing us as your entertainment.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Family friendly ghost tour? Who knew.
data.text: I took my boys ages 10 and 5 on the family friendly tour. I wasn't sure what to expect but it was amazing how much Anita put in to our 55 minute tour. We stopped at 8 different places where she talked about its historical past then shared a ghost story that the kids loved! Thanks for including families.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so happy you enjoyed the family friendly tour. We didn't want to leave out the little ones who enjoy a more appropriate version of the tour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Thanks for a great time!
data.text: We can't wait to the next scheduled big event. Our family had a great time and learned a lot. Anita is an enthusiastic tour guide and we were so impressed we bought a shirt. We highly recommend the tour.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Manager at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for joining us and we'd love to have you back.   We appreciate your business and kind words.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Adventure through history and horror
data.text: My family and I have been on two guided tours.  The tour guides have passion for what they do.  You will recognize right away that these folks have spent a lot of time researching the tales and legends that New Braunfels history has hidden away.  Many of the ghost stories have been shared by firsthand encounters.  Making the experience even creepier.  Not saying that you may not be able to to sleep at night... only that you may pass on an oportunity to spend any time alone in some of these haunted locations...and yes, you will come away questioning yourself, when you say ghost are not real?

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for bringing your family along. The ghost stories are a great way for us to sneak in the amazing history of New Braunfels to children. We continue to interview guests who stay and/or work in the buildings on our stops, so that we can continually provide our guests with new experiences.  Thanks again Jeff.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun night on the town!
data.text: Was looking for something new to do around town with my friends. We loaded up a wagon of wine and headed to the ghost tours! We had a fantastic time walking around downtown learning incredible history and hearing some creepy ghost stories about NB.  Our tour guides were amazing story tellers and we ended up having the best night out. I highly recommend this tour to locals and visitors alike - we will definitely go back for a pub crawl!

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad you joined us for a night with your friends.  Thank you for your generous review. We love telling our guests about NB's rich history and the ghost stories make it a night to remember.  Can't wait to have you back on a crawl.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The most interesting, current, fun, hip, and scary historical tour of New Braunfels!
data.text: I took my favorite girl friends on this ghost tour. We are a mixed bunch - most grew up in New Braunfels, two are teachers in NewBraunfels and very familiar Texas history, and two of us have lived here over 15 years. This was the most fun and unique 90 minutes. The guides are very knowledgeable and entertaining. It is very affordable and very appropriate for a varied audience. Several of my friends will do this tour again with their husbands, kids, and one friend mentioned bringing her mom and her friends as she may have eve known some of the german families reference in the tour. Whether you are a resident, the newcomer, a visitor, young or old, the New Braunfels Ghost Tour is a creative and fun way to spend your time in this neat, historical town.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for the kind review. We take pride in our little business and have fun too. Kathryn said great things about your group. What a fun bunch. Glad you all enjoyed the ghost tour adventure.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of a kind experience
data.text: Anita and Rick were a great team of guides as they helped enlighten our paths on the hallowed streets of New Braunfels on Friday the 13th.  As a local, I learned so many historical events about this great city with the haunting and ghost stories serving as the bow on top of the package.   Anita and Rick catered the tour for our teenage daughter's birthday with 10 of her friends.  The girls had a blast and we were able to rent rooms at the haunted Faust for them overnight to add to the creepy factor.  If you are a visitor, I could see this tour as a great way to get aquatinted with downtown New Braunfels so you have even more ideas of places to visit ( shops, bars, music venues and restaurants). If you're a local, you will be intrigued by all of the hidden stories, tragic events and historical occurrences that have taken place right under your feet. Don't wait, sign up for one of these tours today while the weather is perfect.

owner_response.author: ghosttourgal, Owner at New Braunfels Ghost Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words. We love what we do and I hope it shows. The birthday girls and friends were a fun group of kids. We'd love to hear about your Faust stay!  Thanks for supporting small businesses.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
